love.text: What do you like best about the product?

The smart grid is also a really great way to show how your company is perceived in the market place.

attributes.title: Advocately has made creating an advocate marketing program a breeze.

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value:
As a Community Manager I am responsible for crafting and executing our advocate program. Perhaps the most challenging aspect of creating an advocate program is finding the advocates. Advocately has eliminated challenge. The advocates, through Advocately, came to me! Not only do I now have a growing list of advocates, but I am able to see exactly what they love about our software. This enables me to push feedback to the marketing, development, and customer success teams so that we can enhance what people love.

Aside from the actual product, Patrick and Lachlan are amazing. Support, response times, and personality are all 10/10. You guys rock!

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value:
Getting good reviews isn't easy. It takes time, consideration, and often gets pushed aside by other projects. Advocately does the asking and consideration for us, so that it doesn't get pushed aside. 

Along with the massive help Advocately has provided me with our advocate marketing plan, it has also enhanced our SEO efforts. Many of the organic search results we obtained are fueled by customer reviews. Social proof is a HUGE influencer in our marketing efforts. 

Another extremely important aspect of Advocately is that we are able to identify our users who don't love the product. This gives us the opportunity to reach out to provide further support so that they can learn to love our software. As a company is it SO important to listen to what users experience and Advocately makes this so easy.

attributes.title: G2Crowd leads the pack of review sites

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value: G2Crowd has invested heavily in advertising their brand versus the other review sites.  As a result they have a much bigger quantity of reviews.  So it has traction now and people trust it to create a shortlist and to determine what others think.

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value: G2Crowd rank not given enough prominence. Don't like paid for reviews (think this should be charity donation only) as encourages people to make up reviews.  I think there should be some way of seeing the balance of reviews from particular companies (at the moment you could have 100 reviews from a single customer which could skew review count).

recommendations.text: Recommendations to others considering the product:
recommendations.value: Check out the other review sites, find out whether the reviews and sufficient quality and quantity.  I suspect you will find that G2Crowd wins hands down.

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value: The companies that buy our product want a way of finding competitors to solve a specific problem. They want independent reviews and they want sufficient quantities of them to be able to judge effectively (i.e. be able to weed out the overly negative and the overly enthusiastic).  As a vendor of a great product then having the ability for prospects to find us in the first place and then to see what others think rather than being influenced by whichever vendor has the biggest marketing budget is important.

attributes.review_source: G2 Gives Campaign. This reviewer was offered a donation to a charitable cause in their name as thanks for completing this review.

attributes.title: Best Tech Review Site on the Internet

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value: G2 Crowd provides a very impartial and fully verified technology software review forum. The technology sections are well defined and nicely summarized.  Overall, it's very professional and you can actually count on the review provided since they can't be manipulated by the vendors.   Really like the way that we can embed the review widgets on our own website with links to our optimized landing page.  The environment provides a great user experience for visitors to our website and illustrates how open we are to input from our customers. The style of review presentation is also very easy for visitors to consume. It's similar to consumer based review sites, but with much higher data quality.  We count on the fact that prospects reading our reviews can trust the customer input.

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value: Difficult to say what I dislike, but if I had to choose I would say that sometimes the technology categories are too general. This can result sometimes in very different, non-competitive products in the same category.  This makes products hard to compare at times.

recommendations.text: Recommendations to others considering the product:
recommendations.value: Great way of providing prospects with excellent reviews of your products to speed the purchase decision process.

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value: Vendor provided case studies are great, but we wanted reviews and comments that were impartial to assist with speeding the sales decision making process for prospects.  Our sales team often share our G2 Crowd page to demonstrate how open and proud we are of our software and service.

attributes.title: If you aren't working with G2 Crowd, you should be!

service_task_overview.text: Describe the project or task the product helped with:
service_task_overview.value: We have been working with G2 Crowd since 2014 when they first released their quadrant for expense management providers. Our original intent for working with G2 Crowd was to provide an unbiased set of competitive data in a report that we could share with our prospects during the buying cycle. Now nearly four years later, we have grown our spend with G2 Crowd by 300%+, sponsor 3-4 reports a year, sponsor banner ads and manage a lead generation effort through this channel. G2 Crowd has proven to be a successful method for generating quality leads and delivering an ROI, year after year.

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value:
I really enjoy working with G2 Crowd for a few reasons, one of them being their customer support. The team at G2 Crowd has worked hand in hand with Certify to create custom content to better suit our needs and help position Certify stronger in the selling process. 

From a technology standpoint, I really value the competitive analysis aspect of G2 Crowd. The fact that a prospect can search and compare over 1,000 reviews on expense management in minutes and rank the top performing vendors is really invaluable. Having this Yelp-like review process for business software has allowed us to showcase our strengths against competitors and replace the traditional client referral process.

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value: There really is not much if anything that I dislike about G2 Crowd. Naturally, as the company has grown, so has their pricing which can make budgeting and forecasting harder. I do also wish there were additional ways for Certify to generate more leads out of the system but I also understand this isn't their core solution offering.

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value: The system could be a bit more intuitive and cleaner for end users coming to look at reviews. You guys should get rid of that grid. It is confusing as heck. I am not a proponent of copy catting all the time, but on this one you could just take a que from Yelp or Tripadvisor in terms of how to present the best company in each category.  A list view is much better and simpler.  Also, I think you guys should better figure out the right companies that should be in a respective category. For us, there are people in our category whose primary product is not in our category yet they are able to rank higher than us in our category because they got more reviews in there primary category. It's a bit misleading I think for the end users relying on your site for reviews.

attributes.title: Add another channel to your inbound marketing

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value:
G2 Crowd gets great traffic, even in my company's lesser known product category. By pushing the pageviews to Slack via Zapier the entire sales and marketing team can easily get a sense of how many people are landing on our page every day. It's between 10-15. G2C isn't a huge source of demo requests, but the awareness from this website is good.

CSMs are very responsive (thanks Mark!)

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value: It's impossible (or at least very hard) to quantify the ROI. You can track your demo requests from G2C in Salesforce and measure that ROI, but I think the true value of G2C lies in the TOFU brand awareness you get from people viewing your page. And the data you get about your pageviews is not good. You're handed IP addresses that get matched against a spotty database (e.g. you will see a lot of "Comcast LLC viewed your page") and that's it. Without refining that data to the individual lead level, it's hard to give real attribution value to the pageviews you see on G2C. Maybe it's a great first touch channel, but you'll never really know.

recommendations.text: Recommendations to others considering the product:
recommendations.value:
Get us an easy to use API so that we can hook it up to enrichment vendors like LeadLander, etc. We need to be able to see the ROI on pageviews. Without getting us this ROI data, there is an upper limit on how much we will pay for G2C. Adding it would allow us to pay more.

When I have requests that require the help of a product or engineering team, the turnaround can be between a few days to a week or so. It would be great to speed up the cross-functional questions.

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value: We use this as another web property to source inbound interest. It seems to capture a different group of people than our main website does.

There a few main ways that we are seeing substantial benefits from using G2Crowd. 

1. G2Crowd allows us to open up a channel for public customer feedback. This feedback, not only allows our team to continue to provide the best solutions to our customers, but it also allows prospective customers to see this feedback directly from existing users.

attributes.title: Got References?

service_task_overview.text: Describe the project or task the product helped with:
service_task_overview.value:
We use this site in a variety of different ways.  First of all, as Customer Satisfaction is very important to us, we use it to gauge how happy our users genuinely are, with our products.  

Equally as important, as a sales leader, we also use this site for references.  All prospects will eventually ask for references prior to making a purchase.  As our business unit is growing quickly, this can often cause reference fatigue as they are hit up over and over again.  Plus, IMO the reference process isn't perfect anyway for the prospect, as they will be biased.  So instead, we have our salespeople just point their prospects to G2Crowd instead.  "Instead of me giving you the names of my 5 best customers, why don't you go to G2Crowd instead?  There you'll find verified reviews of actual users (not analysts that have never used the tools themselves), of our solution as well as our competitors.  And then from there you can do as many backdoor references as you'd like."  

This is win/win.  The prospect gets better reviews from users, that aren't prepped or set up....and we get our reference checks.

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value: It makes our lives much easier and as they are verified users, its genuine.  There's nothing to hide, which promotes good partnership.

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value: Doesn't always have every solution / every product.

recommendations.text: Recommendations to others considering the product:
recommendations.value:
Add to it.  As this platform is all about reviews from the real life community, it gets better with the more active community members contribute to the site.  

Continue to monitor it.  Similar to Yelp or Glassdoor or other review sites, it can provide great insights into the health of your business.

attributes.title: Hidden Gem in any online business marketing strategy

service_task_overview.text: Describe the project or task the product helped with:
service_task_overview.value:
While most businesses have now realized the importance of well-written content for their websites, there is one specific type of content that is widely embraced by all, reviews of your business, in one centralized location where others come to make key business buying decisions.

For marketers of Cazoomi, we need to get into the mix of those spec & select decisions where B2B readers, decision makers or influencers, translate into potential buyers. 

We engaged G2 to get cool B2B Infographics, Comparative reports, and key product marketing advice, which is one of the most targeted approaches to comparative based content we think. This allows our small marketing team to engage SMEs at G2 who hail from the Integration industry and know our business well.  We can then share our unique client stories with them and be creatively involved with the story we want to express to the B2B buyer who really relies on reviews and expert content when making decisions which affect not only yearly budgets but also sensitive data migration and integration compliance projects.

As a bonus, all the research and infographics are easily shareable, which makes them a great asset to use in social media platforms, email campaigns, and other digital channels our marketing team use to inform potential integration software buyers.

Overall, I could not say enough about the decision this 2017 to work with G2 to augment our product comparative marketing efforts.

Looking forward to each year penciling them into our yearly marketing budget as well.

~Clint
@cazoomi

attributes.title: Revolutionary approach to purchasing B2B tech

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value:
G2Crows is the best unfiltered and comprehensive platform to learn about strengths and weaknesses of various b2b tech in the market both established and contending.

The comparisons are also great because they turn unstructured written reviews into actionable and measurable data across a range of metrics.  This means a decision maker can choose to focus on overall ratings, specific features, or the various rich and qualitative reviews.

What's more, all of this is based on validated profiles, so no fake reviews.

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value: The only downside is that some product categories are less rich in reviews than others. Something that surely will take time to develop but worth looking forward to.

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value:
This platform is adding a new dimension to how we market and sell to our customers.  The insight that can be shared from reviews and where users spend their time whilst on the platform allows marketers to form a view on who their buyers are and what they are interested in.

G2Crowd is changing the way we all learn about, evaluate and purchase b2b software. We don't go out to eat somewhere new without checking out tripadvisor or yelp and we certainly don't book a holiday before checking out reviews and pictures from people who have actually been there.  G2Crowd brings this piece of mind to b2b software. It amazes that many companies still make significant purchasing decisions on outdated and obscure reviews from old school analysts who have probably never used the product.

G2Crows is solving for a massively underserved market of buyer and sellers who could all do with more transparency and trust!

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value: It's the age of the customer, let's face it. Which means as marketers we must embrace the voice of our customers to build brand and drive demand. G2Crowd Marketing Solutions not only allow us to manage a branded profile - host assets for download and offer various CTAs for lead gen purposes, but they also help in ensuring your company follows best practices when it comes to recruiting and leveraging reviews. In addition, they offer super valuable competitive comparison reports to help your sales team deposition the competition, shorten sales cycles and ultimately win more deals! Lastly, they've got a wealth of data that your marketing team can leverage for better intel and retargeting purposes. Also, kudos to Matt Lazares, our client manager, who has been stellar to work with -- smart and knows how to work with his clients to ensure they get the most impact out of their investment.

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value: If there was something that I disliked, I wouldn't be taking the time to review the product offering.... But, the only thing I am waiting from them on is an API direct integration to SFDC so we can more readily leverage the active search data and push it to our sales team faster. attributes.title: Essential and Effective

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value: G2Crowd is an essential customer touchpoint in our audience's evaluation and buying process. It allows us to invite our customers to review/promote us online where others are looking, we can brand our page and we can capture contact information of those interested in a solution like ours. And when we need our account manager is there to help!

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value: There's nothing I can think of that I dislike, except we can't control the traffic to our page as we would increase that if we could.

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value: We have been able to increase credibility with our audience that we were already speaking with, and we have been able to generate awareness and start conversations with companies we were not yet speaking with. love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value:

attributes.title: G2Crowd is a great channel for lead generation and customer testimonial generation!

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value:
The great custom on boarding by the account team has helped us set up a successful review campaign very fast.

This platform has added a new dimension to our demand gen and marketing programs. The unbiased review platform is a great tool for presenting our product to buyers in the research stage and educating them about our product.

Also would be great if the Leader batches are updated more often to allow for profile reflection of rid changes.

attributes.title: Great tool for Sharing Unbiased Information with Prospects

service_task_overview.text: Describe the project or task the product helped with:
service_task_overview.value: Our team places a high value on customer feedback and reviews, so we try to maintain a significant presence on all prominent software review sites and even collect customer reviews on our own website. We saw G2 Crowd as a great opportunity for expanding the breadth of reviews we have. Our G2 Crowd rep did an amazing job with getting us started and sharing best practices for gathering new reviews. We were really impressed by all of the features G2 Crowd offered beyond reviews, especially the comparison grid, the focused profile, and the lead generation capabilities.

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value: My favorite feature is the comparison grid that allows prospects to see how we stack up against our competitors and the focused profile that we can send to prospects.

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value: The visitors section gives me mostly individuals who are not relevant to our business.

recommendations.text: Recommendations to others considering the product:
recommendations.value: The reps are extremely knowledgable and responsive, so I would make sure that you speak with them as much as possible during the sales and implementation stages. They will help you figure out if/how G2 Crowd aligns with your goals and every use case you could have for their service.

attributes.title: One of the best peer review sites for B2B SaaS solutions

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value: G2 Crowd provided the best onboarding experience compared to some of the other peer review sites I have used. Our dedicated account manager and implementation specialist worked with us through every step ensuring that we were leveraging all that G2 Crowd has to offer.

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value: It is not possible to download all the customer reviews for further processing. There is a paid product that gives you additional insights but it doesn't directly provide an easy export option for all reviews either.

recommendations.text: Recommendations to others considering the product:
recommendations.value: G2 Crowd offers fantastic support during the initial rollout and provides some of the best options for leveraging the customer reviews in your future marketing and sales efforts. Definitely check them out.

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value: Many, if not most, business users tend to check what their peers are saying about the solutions they are investigating. The voice of customers is more authenticate than vendor boasting about themselves. G2 Crowd provides an additional outlet for our customers to share their experience about our platform with us and the world. We have learned a lot about what customers like and dislike about our product. Our sales team has been able to leverage the product reviews as a tool during the sales cycle.
